name: Li Ming
chef_description: A chef is a culinary professional who prepares food in a variety of settings, such as restaurants, hotels, and catering companies. They oversee the entire food preparation process, from selecting ingredients to creating recipes and cooking meals. A successful chef must have a deep knowledge of cooking techniques, a creative flair, and excellent time-management and organizational skills.

recipes.description: A spicy, stir-fry dish made with chicken, peanuts, vegetables, and chili peppers.
recipes.instructions: Marinate the chicken in soy sauce, rice wine, and cornstarch for 20 minutes.,Stir-fry the chicken ,peanuts, and vegetables in a wok until cooked through.,Add the sauce (made with soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, and cornstarch) and dried red chili peppers, and stir-fry until everything is coated and the sauce has thickened.

recipes.description: A classic Chinese soup made with mushrooms, tofu, bamboo shoots, and a spicy and sour broth.
recipes.instructions: Soak the dried mushrooms in hot water until they are soft.,Bring the chicken broth to a boil, and add the mushrooms, bamboo shoots, and tofu.,Season the soup with vinegar, soy sauce, chili oil, and white pepper.,Whisk the eggs in a small bowl, and pour them into the soup while stirring slowly.

recipes.recipe_name: Steamed Fish with Ginger and Scallions
recipes.description: A simple and healthy dish made with fresh fish, ginger, scallions, and soy sauce.
recipes.instructions: Clean and scale the fish, and place it on a heatproof dish.,Scatter the ginger and scallions on top of the fish, and drizzle with soy sauce.,Steam the fish for 10-15 minutes, or until cooked through.,Garnish with more scallions, and serve.

recipes.instructions: 1. Cut chicken breast into small cubes and marinate with soy sauce, vinegar, and cornstarch for 20 minutes. 2. Fry the chicken cubes in hot oil until golden brown. 3. Stir-fry dried chili pepper, ginger, garlic, and green onion until fragrant. 4. Add the fried chicken, peanuts, sugar, soy sauce, vinegar.

1. Soak black fungus in water for 20 minutes and cut into small pieces. 2. Bring chicken broth to a boil and add tofu, bamboo shoots, and black fungus. 3. Beat eggs and pour into the soup while stirring. 4. Mix cornstarch with water and add to the soup to thicken it.

recipes.recipe_name: Steamed Fish with Ginger and Scallions

name: Marie Leclerc
chef_description: A chef is a culinary professional who prepares food in a variety of settings, such as restaurants, hotels, and catering companies. They oversee the entire food preparation process, from selecting ingredients to creating recipes and cooking meals. A successful chef must have a deep knowledge of cooking techniques

recipes.instructions: 1. Cut eggplant, zucchini, and red bell pepper into small cubes. 2. Finely chop onion and garlic. 3. Heat olive oil in a large pot and sauté onion and garlic until translucent. 4. Add eggplant, zucchini, and red bell pepper and cook for 10 minutes. 5. Add chopped tomato, thyme, rosemary, and bay leaf.

1. Cut beef chuck roast into small cubes. 2. Cut bacon and carrots into small pieces. 3. Finely chop onion and garlic. 4. In a large pot, cook bacon until crispy and remove from pot. 5. Sear beef cubes in the bacon fat until browned on all sides. 6. Add onion and garlic and sauté until translucent.

1. Preheat oven to 300°F. 2. In a medium saucepan, heat heavy cream over medium heat until hot but not boiling. 3. In a separate bowl, whisk egg yolks and sugar until pale and thick. 4. recipes.description: A classic Chinese stir-fry made with tender beef, fresh broccoli, and a savory sauce.
recipes.instructions: Marinate the beef in soy sauce and cornstarch for 15 minutes,Blanch the broccoli in boiling water for 2 minutes, then rinse with cold water,Stir-fry the beef in a hot wok until browned and cooked through,Add the broccoli and the sauce (made with soy sauce, oyster sauce, and cornstarch),

recipes.description: A simple and comforting soup made with eggs, chicken broth, and green onions.
recipes.instructions: Bring the chicken broth to a boil.,Beat the eggs in a small bowl, and slowly pour them into the broth while stirring.,Add the chopped green onions, and season with salt and pepper.,Simmer for a few minutes until the eggs are cooked through.,Serve hot.

recipes.description: A classic Chinese fried rice made with shrimp, vegetables, and fluffy rice.
recipes.instructions: Cook the rice according to package instructions, and let it cool completely.,Heat some oil in a wok, and stir-fry the shrimp and vegetables until cooked through.,Add the cooled rice, and stir-fry until everything is well combined.,Season with soy sauce, sesame oil, and white pepper.

recipes.description: A classic Chinese fried rice dish with ham, shrimp, and vegetables.
recipes.instructions: Heat some oil in a wok and add the diced ham, shrimp, and vegetables.,Stir-fry for a few minutes until everything is cooked through.,Add the cooked rice and stir-fry until it is heated through and well mixed with the other ingredients.,Add the scrambled eggs, soy sauce, and sesame oil,

recipes.description: A spicy Sichuan dish made with tofu, ground pork, and fermented black beans.
recipes.instructions: Cut the tofu into small cubes and soak them in hot water for 10 minutes.,Brown the ground pork in a wok with some oil and garlic.,Add the chili flakes, fermented black beans, and Sichuan peppercorns, and stir-fry until fragrant.,Add the tofu, along with some soy sauce and chicken broth, and simmer until the sauce has thickened.,Garnish with chopped scallions and serve with steamed rice.

recipes.description: A light and comforting soup made with eggs, chicken broth, and green onions.
